doc.description:
JSBSim FDM backend for NPS simulator
Use the paparazzi-jsbsim package if it is installed, otherwise look for JSBsim under /usr
JSBSim website: https://jsbsim-team.github.io/jsbsim-reference-manual/ JSBSim source: https://github.com/JSBSim-Team/jsbsim JSBSim/PPRZ doc: http://wiki.paparazziuav.org/wiki/JSBSim NPS doc: http://wiki.paparazziuav.org/wiki/NPS

configure.name: FIND_JSBSIM_VIA_PKG_CONFIG
configure.description: enable or disable using pkg-config to get library flags (enabled by default when package exists)

configure.name: JSBSIM_ROOT
configure.description: set root directory for JSBSim library when auto-detection (see FIND_JSBSIM_VIA_PKG_CONFIG) is not used (default path: /usr)

configure.name: JSBSIM_USE_SGPATH
configure.description: old version of jsbsim don't use SGPath module, can be forced to true or false if not found automatically

makefile.raw: ifeq ($(FIND_JSBSIM_VIA_PKG_CONFIG), yes) nps.CFLAGS += $(shell pkg-config JSBSim --cflags) nps.LDFLAGS += $(shell pkg-config JSBSim --libs) ifeq ($(shell pkg-config JSBSim --modversion), 1.0) nps.CFLAGS += -DNPS_JSBSIM_USE_SGPATH=FALSE else nps.CFLAGS += -DNPS_JSBSIM_USE_SGPATH=$(JSBSIM_USE_SGPATH) endif else FIND_JSBSIM_VIA_PKG_CONFIG = no nps.CFLAGS += -I$(JSBSIM_INC) nps.LDFLAGS += -L$(JSBSIM_LIB) -lJSBSim nps.CFLAGS += -DNPS_JSBSIM_USE_SGPATH=$(JSBSIM_USE_SGPATH) endif
